item.title: Bitwig controller script tutorial
item.description: Shotrcuts Ctrl + Shift + J Console Ctrl + R Reload the script live while in the console Functions Utilities println(string) Print a line in the console errorln(string) Print a error in the console showPopupNotification(string) Show a popup in the GUI (not the console) printMidi(status, key, value) Helper to print a Midi command Global settings loadAPI(12); host.
